page.innerHtml: One of key elements of BESAMEL is it's background principles. You style your component using another tags and wrap it in .make-section-bg . ! You also must have .bg on some of it's parents.

innerHtml: .stretch - Stretches the element (if it is a img)

page.innerHtml: When styling a bg layout, don't put .make-section-bg on img tags, but rather wrap them into div.make-section-bg
